item.title: GitOPs

item.title: Kubernetes 筆記 - Knative
item.description: kubespray 按照上次安裝 istio 安裝 istioctl https://istio.io/docs/setup/getting-started/ 安裝 istio istioctl install https://istio.io/docs/setup/install/istioctl/ knative metalLB 安裝 https://metallb.universe.tf/installation/ 設定 Layer 2 (網路架構的L2) apiVersion:v1kind:ConfigMapmetadata:namespace:metallb-systemname:configdata:config:|address-pools: - name: default protocol: layer2 addresses: - 192.168.1.240-192.168.1.250 # 多 ip - 192.168.1.240/32 # 單 ip 當設定成功後輸入 kubectl get service -n istio-system isti
